alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 10:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Johns, northern Putnam, Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1015 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sawgrass to near Orange Heights. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Hastings, Fruit Cove, Ponte Vedra Beach, Melrose and World Golf Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam
